alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 11:27AM EDT until March 28 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Kosciusko, Marshall, Starke, Pulaski and Fulton IN Counties. .Recent rainfall has resulted in rising water on area rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River near Linn Grove. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Agricultural flooding begins. Low lands east of Geneva begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 11.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
